title: LG OLW480B TV mount/stand 165.1 cm (65") Grey
description:
LG OLW480B TV mount/stand 165.1 cm (65") Grey


Mount your stunning TVs on the wall with the LG OLW480B tilting wall mount. Compatible with 2018 LG TVs, this wall mount will help highlight the surprisingly slim TV design.

- **Weight & dimensions**: Width: 450 mm; Depth: 23 mm; Height: 345 mm
- **Design**: Product colour: Grey; Compatibility: OLED65E8PLA, OLED55E8PLA, OLED77C8LLA, OLED65C8PLA, OLED55C8PLA, OLED65B8PLA, OLED55B8PLA, OLED65B8SLC, OLED55B8SLC, 65SK9500PLA, 55SK9500PLA, 65SK8500PLA, 55SK8500PLA, 65SK8100PLA, 55SK8100PLA, 65SK8000PLB, 55SK8000PLB, 65UK7550PLA, 55UK7550PLA, 65UK6950PLB, 55UK6950PLB, 65UK6750PLD, 55UK6750PLD, 65UK6500PLA, 55UK6500PLA, 65UK6470PLC, 55UK6470PLC, 65UK6400PLF, 55UK6400PLF, 65UK6300PLB, 55UK6300PLB
- **Mounting**: Number of displays supported: 1; Maximum screen size: 165.1 cm (65"); Mounting type: Wall; Maximum weight capacity: 50 kg

title: Chief MWH6542S TV mount/stand 106.7 cm (42") Silver
description:
Chief MWH6542S TV mount/stand 106.7 cm (42") Silver


This swing arm wall mount is great solution for flat panel display installations requiring more viewing flexiblity. - Mounts to a single stud for a more discrete installation - See the MWR for 16" center stud mounting and increased weight capacity - Single stud mounting with up to 4.5 " lateral shift - Extends 24.88 " (632 mm) from wall and remains low profile in the home position - Chief exclusive ClickConnect mounting system provides simplified tooless latching with an audible click! - Centris Technology provides smooth, fingertip tilt adjustments - Screen can be installed in portrait or landscape orientation ( MAC400 accessory can be used to rotate without removing the screen) - Mounting guides provided for a hassle-free installation - Provides positive latch in home position to keep screen tight to wall - CableTrac System provides a fast and effective way to route cables


Key Specifications:
- **Design**: Product colour: Silver; Housing material: Metal
- **Ergonomics**: Tilt angle range: -15 - 5°
- **Mounting**: Number of displays supported: 1; Maximum screen size: 106.7 cm (42"); Mounting type: Wall; Maximum weight capacity: 45.4 kg

title: Chief TPM2020 TV mount/stand 180.3 cm (71") Black
description:
Chief TPM2020 TV mount/stand 180.3 cm (71") Black


Quick, easy and versatile, the Truss/Pole Static Mounts, Pole Tilt-Adjustable Mounts and Truss Tilt-Adjustable Mounts are often used for mounting the large flat panel displays used in exhibit, retail and digital signage. - Clamps for different size poles and truss work are required and must be ordered separately (see TPK kits and chart) - Three Flat Panel Mount Options: Truss/Pole Static Mount, Pole Pitch-Adjustable Mount, and Truss Pitch-Adjustable Mount - Three Tilt Adjustment Options on TPM and TPP: +/- 15 º tilt on gravity centered axis point, lockable tilt, pre-set tilt locking points at 0º, 5º, 10º and 15 º to quickly and easily align multiple displays - Install mount horizontally and use pitch adjustment for side-to-side pivot - Install on vertical or horizontal truss - Attach displays in portrait or landscape orientation - TPS/TPP span most truss systems up to 14" (OD) - Truss/Pole clamps fit a wide variety of truss and pole dimensions - Finishing Cover accessories enhance aesthetics and cover hardware for added security - Exclusive Q-Latch Mounting System secures the Large Flat Panel Display with a lockable latch - Screen can be installed in portrait or landscape orientation (PAC400 or MAC400 accessory can be used to rotate without removing the screen) - Integrated security allows display to be locked to mount by adding a padlock - Compatible with TPK clamp accessories. See Accessory list below. - TPMU universal version available which includes universal PSBUB interface. TPM2000B is available but must order TPM2000B and PSBXXXX custom or universal interface separately.


Key Specifications:
- **Other features**: Dimensions (WxDxH): 433 x 86 x 412 mm
- **Packaging data**: Package weight: 15 g
- **Design**: Product colour: Black
- **Mounting**: Number of displays supported: 1; Maximum screen size: 180.3 cm (71"); Mounting type: Ceiling; Maximum weight capacity: 68 kg; Minimum VESA mount: 200 x 200 mm; Maximum VESA mount: 200 x 200 mm; Minimum screen size: 106.7 cm (42")

title: Chief MWR6246S TV mount/stand 127 cm (50") Silver
description:
Chief MWR6246S TV mount/stand 127 cm (50") Silver


- Provides full extension while remaining low profile in the home position - Centris Technolgoy provides fingertip tilt adjustments - CableTrac System provides a fast and effective way to route cables - Swivel up to 90° left or right (depending upon screen size) - Integrated lateral shift 6" left and right (ships shifted 2.5" to the left) - Mounting guides provided for a hassle-free installation - Q-Latch Mounting System secures flat panel to mount with a latching flag - Screen can be installed in portrait or landscape orientation (MAC400 accessory can be used to rotate without removing the screen)


Key Specifications:
- **Design**: Product colour: Silver; Housing material: Steel
- **Ergonomics**: Tilt angle range: -15 - 5°; Swivel angle range: 0 - 90°
- **Mounting**: Number of displays supported: 1; Maximum screen size: 127 cm (50"); Mounting type: Wall; Maximum weight capacity: 56.7 kg

title: Techly Wall Mount for LED LCD TV 15-27 Tilt Swivel 1 White / Black" ICA-LCD 217
description:
Techly Wall Mount for LED LCD TV 15-27 Tilt Swivel 1 White / Black" ICA-LCD 217


Wall Mount for LED LCD TV 15-27" Tilt Swivel 1 White / Black - Universal bracket for fixing a flat LED / LCD wall; Easy and quick to install, it is ideal for home, office and commercial applications - Wall support full-motion with single arm - The aluminum frame provides strength without adding an elegant and modern - Allows you to easily move your TV in all directions - Has management system cables - Quick and easy installation

- **Design**: Product colour: Black, White
- **Ergonomics**: Tilt angle range: -20 - 20°; Distance to the wall (max): 13 cm; Distance to the wall (min): 13 cm

title: Neomounts DS45-430BL19 TV stand 23-75"
description:
Neomounts DS45-430BL19 TV stand 23-75"


The Neomounts DS45-430BL19 is a TV desk stand for screens up to 75" with a weight capacity of 40 kg. The TV stand can be adjusted in height for the optimum viewing position. For maximum compatibility the DS45-430BL19 is suitable for screens that meet pattern 200x200 to 800x400 mm. Additionally, the DS45-430BL19 is also available for non-standard VESA patterns. The DS45-430BL19 TV stand provides an excellent solution for users who prefer not to drill holes in walls or for those who no longer have the original TV stand.


Key Specifications:
- **Other features**: Mounting: Freestanding
- **Logistics data**: Master (outer) case width: 350 mm; Master (outer) case length: 200 mm; Master (outer) case height: 400 mm; Master (outer) case gross weight: 20.7 kg; Master (outer) case net weight: 20.8 kg; Products per master (outer) case: 8 pc(s); Harmonized System (HS) code: 7326909890; Products per pallet (EU): 368 pc(s)
- **Packaging data**: Package width: 165 mm; Package depth: 45 mm; Package height: 385 mm; Package weight: 2.6 kg
- **Weight & dimensions**: Width: 426 mm; Depth: 355 mm; Depth (min): 35.5 cm; Depth (max): 35.5 cm; Height: 735 mm; Weight: 2.4 kg
- **Technical details**: Country of origin: China; Mounting option: Stand; Warranty period: 5 year(s)
- **Design**: Product colour: Black; Housing material: Steel
- **Ergonomics**: Height adjustment range: 0 - 62 mm
- **Mounting**: Number of displays supported: 1; Maximum weight capacity (per display): 40 kg; Maximum screen size: 190.5 cm (75"); Mounting type: Desk; Maximum weight capacity: 40 kg; Minimum VESA mount: 200 x 200 mm; Maximum VESA mount: 800 x 400 mm; Minimum screen size: 58.4 cm (23"); Panel mounting interface: 200 x 200,200 x 300,200 x 400,300 x 100,300 x 200,300 x 300,400 x 200,400 x 300,400 x 400,440 x 400,500 x 400,600 x 300,600 x 200,600 x 400,700 x 400,800 x 200,800 x 400

title: Vogel's VFW 432 LCD wall support Silver
description:
Vogel's VFW 432 LCD wall support Silver


The VFW 432 wall support offers an optimal viewing position thanks to 3 pivot points and the turn and tilt possibility. With the cable clips you can guide your cables. The VFW 432 is a member of a complete product line, the Original series, and is a proven, solid solution. Mount your LCD/TFT to the wall to free up space and give your interior a stylish look. VESA MIS-D, 100, C, MIS-D, 75, C and VESA MIS-E, C, VESA MIS-E 200x200 mm.


Key Specifications:
- **Other features**: Screen size compatibility: 32
- **Design**: Product colour: Silver
- **Ergonomics**: Tilt angle range: 20; Turn angle: 180°
- **Mounting**: Mounting type: Wall; Maximum weight capacity: 32 kg
